thread.title: BRIEF-Navios Maritime Containers Announces Acquisition Of Containership

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Navios Maritime Containers Announces Acquisition Of Containership

organizations.name: brief-navios maritime containers announces acquisition of containership

text:
Jan 16 (Reuters) - Navios Maritime Containers Inc :
* NAVIOS MARITIME CONTAINERS INC. ANNOUNCES ACQUISITION OF CONTAINERSHIP
* NAVIOS MARITIME CONTAINERS INC - ‍IT HAS ACQUIRED NAVIOS FELICITAS, A 2010-BUILT, 4,360 TEU CONTAINERSHIP FOR A PURCHASE PRICE OF $11.45 MILLION​
* NAVIOS MARITIME CONTAINERS - CO FINANCED DEAL WITH CASH ON ITS BALANCE SHEET AND $6.0 MILLION OF BANK DEBT UNDER ONE OF ITS EXISTING CREDIT FACILITIES​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
